Container.Description:
Plex organizes video, music and photos from personal media libraries and streams them to smart TVs, streaming boxes and mobile devices. [br]
[b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]VERSION[/b] Set to either latest, public or a specific version e.g. "1.2.7.2987-1bef33a" [br] [b]/config[/b] Where plex should store settings and metadata\logs and configuration[br] [b]/media[/b] Map this to your media, you can use several submappings here[br]
